meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>beat</kanji> makes you want to <kanji>dance</kanji>. It's the <vocabulary>inspiration</vocabulary> you need to dance. The beat gives you <vocabulary>encouragement</vocabulary> to dance all night long. And without such a rockin' beat you would have lame dance moves.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
